fixes.name: Active Employee
fixes.dax_expression: SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Employee Count]) - SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Attrition Count ])
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau aggregations to DAX by mapping SUM([Employee Count]) and SUM([Attrition Count ]) to SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Employee Count]) and SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Attrition Count ]). Kept as a measure because the calculation uses aggregations (SUM).
